attributes.action: NOT reduce fuel duty and hence petrol prices, to help reduce consumption and so combat climate change.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are many calls to reduce fuel duty to give lower petrol prices.
However, with recent price rises, the level of fuel consumption has fallen and the numbers of people using public transport has increased. 
Keep fuel prices high to help the UK meet its carbon reduction targets and so help address climate change.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
